alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:22PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Skamania County through 645 PM PDT... At 621 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Upper Lewis River Falls, or 10 miles east of Mount St. Helens. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Upper Lewis River Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
